  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2915</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Road Safety</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verkehrssicherheit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sécurité routière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Segurança De Estrada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sicurezza stradale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οδική ασφάλεια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Seguridad De Camino</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An interactive online unit about Road Safety,traffic accidents and their prevention, drinking and driving and safetly belts</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">online unit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">road safety</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">traffic accidents</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine interaktive Onlinemaßeinheit über die 
Verkehrssicherheit, Verkehrsunfälle und ihre Verhinderung, trinkend 
und treibt an und safetly Riemen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une unité en ligne interactive au sujet de la 
sécurité routière, les accidents de trafic et leur empêchement, 
buvant et pilotant et safetly ceinture</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma unidade em linha interativa sobre a 
segurança de estrada, os acidentes de tráfego e a sua prevenção, 
bebendo e dirigindo e safetly correia</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'unità in linea interattiva circa sicurezza 
stradale, incidenti di traffico e la loro prevenzione, beventi e 
moventi e safetly cinghie</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια διαλογική σε απευθείας σύνδεση μονάδα για την 
οδική ασφάλεια, τα τροχαία ατυχήματα και την πρόληψή τους, που 
πίνουν και που οδηγούν και safetly ζώνη</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una unidad en línea interactiva sobre la 
seguridad de camino, accidentes de tráfico y su prevención, bebiendo
y conduciendo y safetly correa</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Onlinemaßeinheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verkehrssicherheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verkehrsunfälle</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>
